==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|じゃ|yomi=o|け}}
From {{etyl|zhx|ja|sort=しゃけ'}} {{m|zh|邪氣}}. The {{m|zh|氣}} was simplified in Japan to {{m|ja|気}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|じゃけ|y=go}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|じゃけ|kyu=邪氣}}

# An [[evil]] or [[malevolent]] [[spirit]].
# An [[illness]] or [[disease]].

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|malevolent spirit}} {{ja-r|物の怪|もの の け}}
* {{sense|disease}} {{ja-r|病気|びょうき}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|じゃ|yomi=o|き}}
{{IPAchar|/dʑake/}} → {{IPAchar|/dʑaki/}}

Shift in reading of {{m|ja|気}} from [[呉音|go'on]] ''ke'' to [[漢音|kan'on]] ''ki''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|じゃき|acc=a|acc2=h|y=o}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|じゃき|kyu=邪氣}}

# A bad [[nature]] or [[disposition]] that could cause [[disease]].
# [[malice|Malice]], [[maliciousness]], a [[menace]], [[ill will]].
# An [[evil]] or [[malevolent]] [[spirit]].
# An evil [[aura]] or [[chi]] [[emit]]ted from an evil spirit.
# A [[cold]], an [[illness]].

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|bad nature}} {{ja-r|悪気|わるぎ}}
* {{sense|malice}} {{ja-r|悪意|あくい}}
* {{sense|malevolent spirit}} {{ja-r|物の怪|もの の け}}
* {{sense|a cold}} {{ja-r|風邪|かぜ}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|じゃ|k1=ざ|yomi=o|け}}
{{IPAchar|/dʑake/}} → {{IPAchar|/zake/}}

Shift in reading of {{m|ja|邪}} from [[呉音|go'on]] ''ja'' to non-[[affricate]]d ''za''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|ざけ|y=go}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ざけ|kyu=邪氣}}

# An [[evil]] or [[malevolent]] [[spirit]].
# A [[curse]].

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|malevolent spirit}} {{ja-r|物の怪|もの の け}}
* {{sense|curse}} {{ja-r|祟り|たたり}}
